resources.string: If you enjoy playing Mastermind, would you mind taking the time to rate it? Thanks for your support!

Aim:
Crack the code

Instructions:
Click on a peg to select it.

Selected pegs are highlighted.

Select a slot in the row pointed to by the arrow to place the peg in it.

When all 4 slots are filled, click on the tick to confirm your guess.

The small red peg means one of the four pegs is the correct colour and in the correct position.

The small white peg means one of the four pegs is the correct colour but is in the wrong position.
